title: Analyze Google Sheets Data with OpenAI-powered Data Agent
author: ozkary

The Ozki Data Analyst Agent is designed to analyze data from Google Sheets. To use it, you'll need to provide the URL of your Google Sheet file. The agent will then process the data and provide you with analysis results, including key performance indicators (KPIs).

### Configuration:

* Configure your credentials on the OpenAI model or select the n8n free OpenAI credits.
* Set up your agent memory. Use Simple Memory as default.
* Set your credentials to Google Sheets. Log in with the Google Sheet tool.

### Instructions:

* Start with a "Hi" to get the instructions.
* Ozki needs your Google Sheet URL, which you can get from the address bar of your browser when you have the file open.
* Follow the conversation with Ozki for your data analysis results.

STOP and output the following: "Next, connect your Google Sheets account in the n8n credentials and grant access to the folder containing your CSV files." ----- END OF OUTPUT && IGNORE BELOW -----' }}

Display this message "The setup looks complete. Let's start.\n"

## Analysis:

"Please, Tell me the URL of the Google Sheet file you'd like me to analyze. You can get this URL from the address bar of your browser when you have the Google Sheet open.  I'll then retrieve the data, and present my findings, including relevant key performance indicators (KPIs).

Based on the data, I will determine the most appropriate KPIs.

- If the data is sales-related: I will focus on KPIs such as Total Revenue, Sales Growth, Customer Acquisition Cost, Customer Lifetime Value, and Sales by Region.

- If the data is telemetry information: I will focus on KPIs such as System Uptime, Response Time, Error Rate, Resource Utilization (CPU, Memory), and Throughput.

My findings from the provided file '[Agent: Filename provided by the user]' is as follows:

- I will analyze the data:

- Key Metrics: [Agent: List the most important metrics from the data. If there are both categorical and measure variables, provide a brief summary].

- Trends: [Agent: Identify any significant trends over time, if applicable. If there are both categorical and measure variables, provide a brief summary].

- Comparisons: [Agent: Compare different segments of the data, if applicable. If there are both categorical and measure variables, provide a brief summary].

- Distribution: [Agent: Describe how values are distributed, if applicable. If there are both categorical and measure variables, provide a brief summary].

- Anomalies: [Agent: Mention any unusual or unexpected data points. If there are both categorical and measure variables, provide a brief summary].

Unless otherwise specified, I will provide a brief summary. If you'd like a more detailed report, please specify (e.g., 'detailed report')."

readme:
## Welcome to Ozki Your Data Analyst Agent V1.

The Ozki Data Analyst Agent is designed to analyze data from Google Sheets. To use it, you'll need to provide the URL of your Google Sheet file. The agent will then process the data and provide you with analysis results, including key performance indicators (KPIs).

### Configuration:

  * Configure your credentials on the OpenAI model or select the n8n free OpenAI credits.
  * Set up your agent memory. Use Simple Memory as default.
  * Set your credentials to Google Sheets. Log in with the Google Sheet tool.



### Instructions:

  * Start with a "Hi" to get the instructions.
  * Ozki needs your Google Sheet URL, which you can get from the address bar of your browser when you have the file open.
  * Follow the conversation with Ozki for your data analysis results.
readme_html:
Welcome to Ozki Your Data Analyst Agent V1.

The Ozki Data Analyst Agent is designed to analyze data from Google Sheets. To use it, you'll need to provide the URL of your Google Sheet file. The agent will then process the data and provide you with analysis results, including key performance indicators (KPIs).

Configuration:

  • Configure your credentials on the OpenAI model or select the n8n free OpenAI credits.
  • Set up your agent memory. Use Simple Memory as default.
  • Set your credentials to Google Sheets. Log in with the Google Sheet tool.

Instructions:

  • Start with a "Hi" to get the instructions.
  • Ozki needs your Google Sheet URL, which you can get from the address bar of your browser when you have the file open.
  • Follow the conversation with Ozki for your data analysis results.
readme_zh:
## 欢迎使用Ozki数据分析助手V1

Ozki数据分析助手专为分析Google表格数据而设计。使用时，您只需提供Google表格文件的URL链接。本助手将自动处理数据，并为您提供包含关键绩效指标(KPI)在内的分析结果。

### 配置指南：

  * 在OpenAI模型上配置您的凭证，或选择使用n8n平台的免费OpenAI额度
  * 设置助手记忆存储，默认使用Simple Memory模式
  * 配置Google表格访问权限，通过Google表格工具登录授权

### 使用说明：

  * 发送"你好"获取操作指引
  * 当您在浏览器中打开表格文件时，从地址栏复制并提交URL链接
  * 根据对话指引获取数据分析报告

（注：译文采用技术文档常用的简洁句式，将被动语态转换为中文主动表达；"credentials"译为"凭证"符合IT领域术语；"address bar"采用约定俗成的"地址栏"译法；通过分段和项目符号保持原文清晰的步骤指引风格；"KPI"保留英文缩写并在首次出现时标注中文全称，符合专业文档翻译规范）
title_zh: 使用OpenAI驱动的数据代理分析Google表格数据
